subject: Testosterone
Books and Literature
Steroids
Baseball
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: According to a new book, “Blood Sport: Alex Rodriguez, Biogenesis and the Quest to End Baseball’s Steroid Era,” Alex Rodriguez was granted a therapeutic-use exemption to take testosterone in 2007, the year he won his third M.V.P. award.
snippet: According to a new book, “Blood Sport: Alex Rodriguez, Biogenesis and the Quest to End Baseball’s Steroid Era,” Alex Rodriguez was granted a therapeutic-use exemption to take testosterone in 2007, the year he won his third M.V.P. award.
